description: Unearthed a container of roast pork that I had frozen with vegetables and gravy, so I used the pork in this. Generous dish for one, particularly with rice.
name: Pork Mushroom and Bok Choy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-3 large bok choy leaves, washed and sliced
0.5 cup sliced mushrooms (I used dried, so reconstituted first)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together water and cornflour in a small bowl until smooth, add oyster sauce and mix in thoroughly. Set aside.
Add oil to a wok or frypan, bring to medium heat.
Toss in bok choy and mushrooms, stir fry until slightly soft, about 2 - 3 minutes, then add pork and warm through.
Reduce to gentle heat. Add the water/cornflour/oyster sauce mixture and stir while allowing the sauce to coat the other ingredients, about 2 -3 minutes.
Plate up and toss toasted sesame seeds over to finish.
